StringTable.Label: IconianTechTree_Name
StringTable.String: Iconian Tech Tree

StringTable.Label: IconianTechTree_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Tech tree focused on Expansion.

StringTable.Label: IconianTechTree_Dec
StringTable.String: Tech tree focused on Expansion.

StringTable.Label: IconianMolecularFabricationTech_Name
StringTable.String: Molecular Fabrication

StringTable.Label: IconianMolecularFabricationTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows for the creation of the Molecular Fabricator

StringTable.Label: IconianMolecularFabricationTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Molecular Fabrication is more than just a way to boost manufacturing, it can be used to make everything from more efficient weapons to more nutritious food.

StringTable.Label: IconianMolecularSpecialization1_Name
StringTable.String: Molecular Manufacturing

StringTable.Label: IconianMolecularSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the Manufacturing of your colonies

StringTable.Label: IconianMolecularSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: We have been able to use Molecular Fabrication techniques, to greatly increase the output of our factories, with no additional resources or cost.

StringTable.Label: IconianMolecularSpecialization2_Name
StringTable.String: Molecular Farming

StringTable.Label: IconianMolecularSpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the Food supply of your colonies

StringTable.Label: IconianMolecularSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: We have been able to use Molecular Fabrication techniques to greatly increase the output of our farms, with no additional resources or cost.

StringTable.Label: IconianMolecularSpecialization3_Name
StringTable.String: Molecular Computers

StringTable.Label: IconianMolecularSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the Research output of our colonies.

StringTable.Label: IconianMolecularSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: We have been able to use Molecular Fabrication techniques to greatly increases the output of our research facilities, with no additional resources or cost.

StringTable.Label: IconianIndustrialReplicationTech_Name
StringTable.String: Industrial Replication

StringTable.Label: IconianIndustrialReplicationTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows for the creation of the Industrial Replicator

StringTable.Label: IconianIndustrialReplicationTech_Dec
StringTable.String: This is the Ultimate evolution of Molecular Fabrication. With Industrial Replication we can create anything we want, from anything we have.

StringTable.Label: IconianPrecursorLegacy_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Legacy

StringTable.Label: IconianPrecursorLegacy_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows for the creation of the Precursor Archive achievement.

StringTable.Label: IconianPrecursorLegacy_Dec
StringTable.String: As the heir of the Precursors, we have been able to gather all our collective knowledge into a archive, that contains many of the Precursor secrets, and gives us a decided advantage over the other races.

StringTable.Label: IconianRoboticFarming_Name
StringTable.String: Robotic Farming

StringTable.Label: IconianRoboticFarming_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Ircreases the level of all Farms and Population Improvements.

StringTable.Label: IconianRoboticFarming_Dec
StringTable.String: Through the use of obedient, yet still helpful robotic servants, we are able to greatly increase the output of our farms.

StringTable.Label: IconianUltimateAdaptability_Name
StringTable.String: Ultimate Adaptability

StringTable.Label: IconianUltimateAdaptability_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Removes penalties from all types of extreme worlds, and gives them a Production Bonus

StringTable.Label: IconianUltimateAdaptability_Dec
StringTable.String: As an ancient race, we have adapted to survive, and learned how to make the most of even the most hostile environments.

StringTable.Label: IconianPrecursorTraditions_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Traditions

StringTable.Label: IconianPrecursorTraditions_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increase shipyard output and quality.

StringTable.Label: IconianPrecursorTraditions_Dec
StringTable.String: As the heir of the Precursors we know that our ships are more than our tools, they are our loyal companions.

StringTable.Label: IconianPrecursorTraditionSpecialization1_Name
StringTable.String: Healing Hulls

StringTable.Label: IconianPrecursorTraditionSpecialization1_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Our ships will repair themselves in battle.

StringTable.Label: IconianPrecursorTraditionSpecialization1_Dec
StringTable.String: Though our ships are still no match for the great living beings that used to travel the stars, we have been able to learn enough to allow them to slowly heal on their own in battle.

StringTable.Label: IconianPrecursorTraditionSpecialization2_Name
StringTable.String: Intelligent Ships

StringTable.Label: IconianPrecursorTraditionSpecialization2_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Reduces the Logistics of our ships.

StringTable.Label: IconianPrecursorTraditionSpecialization2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our ships can literally work together, even without our aid. This allows us to field more ships with less logistical expense, allowing our fleets to grow larger than any seen since the time of the Precursors.

StringTable.Label: IconianPrecursorTraditionSpecialization3_Name
StringTable.String: Organic Materials

StringTable.Label: IconianPrecursorTraditionSpecialization3_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the Hit Points of our ships.

StringTable.Label: IconianPrecursorTraditionSpecialization3_Dec
StringTable.String: The Organic Materials we use to create our ships, are not only more beautiful, but stronger.

StringTable.Label: IconianPrecursorMysteries_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Mysteries

StringTable.Label: IconianPrecursorMysteries_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows us to build the Precursor Protection Field support module.

StringTable.Label: IconianPrecursorMysteries_Dec
StringTable.String: We have discovered one how to reproduce a powerful Precursor Artifact. Though difficult to produce, it can make almost any fleet nearly indestructible.

StringTable.Label: IconianLivingShipsTech_Name
StringTable.String: Living Ships

StringTable.Label: IconianLivingShipsTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Our ships no longer need to be Maintained, and will self heal

StringTable.Label: IconianLivingShipsTech_Dec
StringTable.String: We are now able to create living ships. Unlike our pervious forays into artificial life, they have proven to be loyal and helpful companions.

StringTable.Label: IconianCommunicationsTech_Name
StringTable.String: Communications

StringTable.Label: IconianTradeMasters_Dec
StringTable.String: Our civilization is synonymous with wealth and trading, and all intelligent beings know our markets are the best, really, only place to buy and sell goods. And, of course, certain advantages accrue to the owner of such a monopoly.

StringTable.Label: IconianPrecursorSole_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Sole

StringTable.Label: IconianPrecursorSole_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Allows construction of the Dream Conclave Achievement

StringTable.Label: IconianPrecursorSole_Dec
StringTable.String: The Precursors taught us that the study of the universe is the key to happiness, and will lead us to greater things, some of them helpful.

StringTable.Label: IconianMolecularSpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Molecular Specialization

StringTable.Label: IconianMolecularSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: What we can do with Molecular Fabrication is amazing, particularly if we specialize.

StringTable.Label: IconianPrecursorTraditionSpecialization_Name
StringTable.String: Precursor Specialization

StringTable.Label: IconianPrecursorTraditionSpecialization_Dec
StringTable.String: With the lessons we have learned form the our Precursor Traditions, we have been able to find new ways to make our ships superior to all others.
